i.p: Dear Valued Customer, Thankyou for purchasing a high quality product from ConnectSmartLife. Enjoy and Explore the fascinating new dimension in aquascape world.
Calibration is done always first time when you purchase the product. The calibration procedure is done once to educate the product about the dimensions of the Aquarium that you are using.
Once the calibration is done, just schedule the water change, sit back and relax. This product would take care of the complete maintenance of your aquarium.

resources.string: This Phone does not support this functionality
